snippet: Last season, Miguel Cabrera led the league in all three categories (. 330, 44, 139) to become baseball’s first triple crown winner since 1967, and he could do it again.
abstract: Detroit Tigers third baseman Miguel Cabrera, who won baseball's triple crown in 2012, is on pace to do it again; is first in batting average (.369), second in home runs (17) and first in runs batted in (65).
lead_paragraph: Last season, Miguel Cabrera led the league in all three categories (. 330, 44, 139) to become baseball’s first triple crown winner since 1967, and he could do it again.

headline.seo: Tigers’ Miguel Cabrera Living and Hitting in Zone of His Own
headline.main: Tigers’ Cabrera Lives and Hits in Zone of His Own
headline.print_headline: Tigers’ Cabrera Living and Hitting in Zone of His Own
